Project description

This is a standalone upgrader for Common Workflow Language documents fromversion draft-3, v1.0, and v1.1 to v1.2.

See https://github.com/sbg/sevenbridges-cwl-draft2-upgrader for upgrading from sbg:draft-2.

It does not check for correctness of the input document, for that one can usethe CWL reference implementation (cwltool --validate).

This is written and tested for Python 3.8, 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, and 3.12.

Install

Installing the official package from PyPI:

pip install cwl-upgrader

Or from source:

git clone https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwl-upgrader.gitpip install ./cwl-upgrader/

Run on the command line

cwl-upgrader path-to-cwl-document [another-path-to-cwl-document ...]
